Create a personalized guitar case that doubles as a mini-album for storing sheet music and gig memorabilia.
Design a line of eco-friendly guitar picks made from recycled materials like bamboo or cornstarch.
Develop an app that uses AI to analyze a guitarist's playing style and suggest exercises and practice routines tailored to their individual needs.
Create a line of guitar-themed clothing, such as t-shirts, hats, and jackets, featuring iconic images and designs associated with the instrument.
